participant_1.name: Sophia
participant_1.personality: enthusiastic and creative, enjoys capturing moments through photography.
participant_1.background: i am fluent in english spanish and french. my favorite colors are red and silver. i'm interested in photography and like taking pictures. my boyfriend and i are moving into an apartment together next week. i'm an elementary school teacher.

participant_2.name: Michael

participant_2.background: i'm a male. i have a children and a dogs. i enjoy american sports. i work in it and have been at the same company for 15 years.
